versions.label: Introduced
versions.raw_html:
The following has special meaning:
green underline denotes added text
red struck out text denotes deleted text
2025 CT S 348
Author: Hwang
Version: Introduced
Version Date: 01/09/2025

STATE OF CONNECTICUT

General Assembly

Proposed Bill No. 348

January Session, 2025

LCO No. 732

*00732*

Referred to Committee on JUDICIARY

Introduced by:

SEN. HWANG, 28th Dist.

AN ACT CONCERNING UNLAWFUL DISSEMINATION OF INTIMATE IMAGES THAT ARE DIGITALLY ALTERED OR CREATED THROUGH THE USE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE.

Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives in General Assembly convened:

That the general statutes be amended to criminalize unauthorized dissemination of intimate images that are digitally altered or created through the use of artificial intelligence.

Statement of Purpose:

To criminalize unauthorized dissemination of intimate images that are digitally altered or created through the use of artificial intelligence.


Copyright © 2025 State Net
